Question
========

The mean of a sample of 25 people has an SEM of 15. Suppose that each of the sample outcomes is multiplied by 3 and that to this is then added 10. The SEM of the sample mean of these 25 transformed, new values is then

Answerlist
----------

* 45
* 55
* 135
* 225

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 45: Correct
* 55: Incorrect
* 135: Incorrect
* 225: Incorrect
